task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see you're accessing from the public website (is_public=true), which means you're not yet an authenticated employee in our system.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I appreciate your interest as you prepare to join us. However, the time tracking procedures and policies are part of our internal documentation, which is only accessible to employees once they've onboarded.

When you officially join and receive your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal wiki which contains detailed information about time tracking procedures, including why we track time and how the system works.

In the meantime, if you have specific questions about what to expect, I'd recommend reaching out to your HR contact or hiring manager who can provide you with relevant onboarding information.
